@mckinnon410 Wasnâ€™t great, but our lack of threat going forward was awful. It was a lot worse than previous games, games at Ibrox etc. Why change a formation that has been so successful with, a formation we have blown teams away with it. Flo and McLaren been great together. Mind boggling.

Unbeaten in 13 games until last night by playing two up top for the best part of it. Lennon changed that last night, bemused as to how thatâ€™s anyoneâ€™s fault but his own. He gambled, it failed, shoulder blame. Players have been superb since January, wrong to say anything less ðŸ’š

@seathsmark @The_Tman10 Celtic have been a lot worse than last season due to not needing to flex their muscles. Didnâ€™t really get out of second gear and itâ€™s a 13 point gap. If they spend (which they donâ€™t need to) the gap will increase again. Either way youâ€™ll no challenge for the title.

@rmorrison1983 Hopefully he takes into context how much extra money he has compared to last season. Season ticket sales up as well, heâ€™s managing a club on the up. Should be enough for him to want to stay. Time will tell. Personally delighted with the season. Fingers crossed for Europe ðŸ’š

@rmorrison1983 Thatâ€™s all very well and good, but because they want to stay doesnâ€™t mean we will get them. All put themselves in the shop window now and you have no idea who will go for them. Replacing McGinn and Dylan is the biggest problem. Possibly European tie in June. Not a lot of time.
